description: This file defines function prototypes for managing network device status parameters, including getting and setting parameter values, validation, commit, and rollback operations. It appears to be an interface layer for network device status management in a C-based codebase.

methods.name: NetworkDevicesStatus_Default_GetParamUlongValue
methods.description: Retrieves a ULONG parameter value for default network device status.

methods.name: NetworkDevicesStatus_Default_SetParamUlongValue
methods.description: Sets a ULONG parameter value for default network device status.

methods.name: NetworkDevicesStatus_GetParamUlongValue
methods.description: Retrieves a ULONG parameter value for network device status.

methods.name: NetworkDevicesStatus_SetParamUlongValue
methods.description: Sets a ULONG parameter value for network device status.

methods.name: NetworkDevicesStatus_GetParamStringValue
methods.description: Retrieves a string parameter value for network device status.

methods.name: NetworkDevicesStatus_GetParamBoolValue
methods.description: Retrieves a boolean parameter value for network device status.

methods.name: NetworkDevicesStatus_SetParamBoolValue
methods.description: Sets a boolean parameter value for network device status.

methods.name: NetworkDevicesStatus_Commit
methods.description: Commits the current changes to network device status.

methods.name: NetworkDevicesStatus_Validate
methods.description: Validates the current network device status parameters.

methods.name: NetworkDevicesStatus_Rollback
methods.description: Rolls back any uncommitted changes in network device status.

methods.name: NetworkDevicesStatus_Default_Commit
methods.description: Commits default network device status parameters.

methods.name: NetworkDevicesStatus_Default_Validate
methods.description: Validates default network device status parameters.

methods.name: NetworkDevicesStatus_Default_Rollback
methods.description: Rolls back default network device status parameters.

methods.name: CosaDmlNetworkDevicesStatusInit
methods.description: Initializes the network devices status management subsystem.
